comment: /** * Create and return a new {@link QualityFeature} from the quality scores of the specified * FASTQ formatted sequence. The quality scores feature has a type "qualityScores" * and will be the same length as the sequence. * * @param fastq FASTQ formatted sequence, must not be null * @return a new {@link QualityFeature} from the quality scores of the specified FASTQ * formatted sequence */
